WorkItem.ClosedComment: Current version accounts for the use of Talents
WorkItem.Description: Need to add some additional Calculation Options to Rawr.Bear for talents, such as Thick Hide.

Comments.Message:
As I posted in the Discussions area, when Bears reach a certain gear level, or if you have 2+ priests/shamans assigned to heal you an entire fight the talent Thick hide is of no use considering Inspiration/Ancestral Fortitude puts you over the armor cap.

The problem with Rawr right now is that it will always calculate gear as though this talent is selected which is fine for the majority of druids, however is not the case for several high end geared druids.
